SELECT rno, image, car_name, car_type, maker, inwon, fuel, car_option, price, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review2 WHERE sno=rno) as rvCount, (SELECT NVL(ROUND(AVG(rating),1),0) FROM review2 WHERE sno=rno) as rvAvg, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jjim2 WHERE sno=rno) as jjimCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jjim2 WHERE sno=rno AND id=#{id}) as jjimOk
FROM rent2 WHERE (SELECT COUNT(sDate) FROM reserve2 WHERE rent2.rno=reserve2.fno AND sDate BETWEEN #{sDate} AND #{eDate} AND type='r') = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(eDate) FROM reserve2 WHERE rent2.rno=reserve2.fno AND eDate BETWEEN #{sDate} AND #{eDate} AND type='r' ) = 0
OR car_type LIKE '%경차%'
OR car_type LIKE '%소형차%'
OR car_type LIKE '%준중형%'
OR car_type LIKE '%중형%'
OR car_type LIKE '%SUV%'
OR car_type LIKE '%승합차%'
OR car_type LIKE '%전기차%'
OR car_type LIKE '%고급차%'
OR car_type LIKE '%수입%'
OR maker LIKE '%기아%'
OR maker LIKE '%현대%'
OR maker NOT LIKE '%기아%' AND maker NOT LIKE '%현대%'
OR TO_NUMBER(inwon) <= 5
OR inwon IN ('6','7','8')
OR TO_NUMBER(inwon) > 8
OR fuel IN('휘발유')
OR fuel IN('경유')
OR fuel NOT IN('휘발유','경유')
ORDER BY rno ASC
